name: Chess Crosser
description:
You play as a brave white pawn, on a quest to run as far as possible through an ever-changing world filled with dangerous black figures. Navigate through a series of obstacles and cross busy roads in this exciting new twist on the classic crossy road genre.

But beware! The black figures are hot on your heels, determined to "eat" you and end your journey. Stay alert and avoid these obstacles at all costs. Use your quick reflexes and precise timing to dodge your way to safety, and see how far you can go.

How far can you run? Can you beat your high score and become the ultimate pawn runner?

Play "Chess Crosser" now and find out!
